function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of adherence to social distancing guidelines","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and potential outbreaks","Mitigation":"Enforcement of strict social distancing rules and guidelines","Technologies":"Surveillance cameras, occupancy sensors","People":"Customers, staff, and visitors","Owner":"Service organizations, venue managers"},{"Description":"Overcrowding in service venues","Impact":"Increased risk of crowding and potential difficulty in maintaining social distance","Mitigation":"Limiting venue capacities, implementing reservation systems","Technologies":"Ticketing systems, occupancy tracking software","People":"Customers, staff, and visitors","Owner":"Service organizations, venue managers"},{"Description":"Lack of trust and confidence in service venues","Impact":"Decreased patronage and revenue due to customer safety concerns","Mitigation":"Investing in clear signage and communication, creating new servicescapes to promote social distancing","Technologies":"Digital signage, wayfinding technologies","People":"Customers, staff, and visitors","Owner":"Service organizations, venue managers"}]}
